objects.text:
ISI Certified Design
Inner Smoke Sun Shield
High Impact Resistant
EPS/ABS Material Shell

product_details.name: Steelbird SBA-7 7Wings ISI Certified Flip-Up Helmet for Men and Women with Inner Smoke Sun Shield (Medium 580 MM, Dashing Black)
product_details.description: Sport: Motorcycling. Certificate Type: ISI. Finish Type: Matte. Shell Type: EPS / ABS Material. Specification Met: isi certified. Shape: Round Oval. Closure Type: Flip. Model Name: SBA-7 Dashing Double Visor. Product Dimensions: 26 x 18 x 25 cm; 1.25 kg. Size: m. Special Features: High Impact Resistant. Country of Origin: India. Item Weight: 1 kg 250 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 26 x 18 x 25 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1.00 Count. Generic Name: Helmet.

banner_details:
This banner features a dark, modern aesthetic with a sleek motorbike helmet image ("product_image") taking visual prominence on the right side. The "heading" text layer, styled in bold white uppercase letters, conveys the brand name at the top left, followed by a prominent red subheading ("subheading") introducing the product category. Below that, the "description" text block outlines product features in a clean, left-aligned white font for quick readability. The price ("price") is enlarged and bold, combining the rupee symbol with the amount in white, drawing immediate attention. A strong call-to-action button ("cta") with a red rectangle background ("cta_background") and white text enhances conversion rate. Decorative lines ("decorative_line") and gradient background effects with soft circular overlays enhance depth and emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Gray to Black Gradient (#1A1A1A to #2C2C2C)
- Bold Red (#D10000)
- Accent Red (#FF0000)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Light Gray Stroke (#444444 @ 10% opacity for decorative borders)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern motorcycle helmet dominated by matte and gloss finishes. The primary color is matte black (#1F1F1F), highlighted by glossy accents in jet black (#0A0A0A) that add visual depth and texture contrast. Subtle silvery-grey areas (#C3C3C3) on the visor hinge and transparent sections reflect light, enhancing the helmet's structure and sophistication. Pops of red (#C1121F) and white (#FFFFFF) in the logo introduce vibrant energy and draw attention. These colors blend harmoniously yet stand out, making the design feel premium and dynamic—ideal for a high-impact advertisement banner with a modern, bold appeal.
